name: raoctober day 1 - "abraham lincoln fruit cup"
description:
I, Zinfandel,  have created  this very, very short experience as an  entry for day 1 of raoctober, following the day's theme, "abraham lincoln fruit cup". I hope you enjoy  it.

The up and down arrow keys navigate dialog boxes.  Enter or Escape close dialog boxes.

Press P at the game's title screen to play,  then use the arrow  keys to move your player around and walk into things to interact with them.
